name: The user add a point to player A successfully
scenarioId: addPoint:The user add a point to player A successfully
methodName: The user add a point to player A successfully

testSteps.description: Given a new tennis game has started with player "A" and player "B"
When the user adds a point to player "A"
Then the score should be "Player A: 15 / Player B: 0" and the game should be "IN_PROGRESS"

userStory.storyName: Add a point to a player
userStory.displayName: Add a point to a player
userStory.narrative: As a user, I want to add a point to a player

title: The user add a point to player A successfully
